description: Summary metrics about containers running on Kubernetes nodes.

targets.expr: (sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{job='node-exporter', instance_name="$node", device=~".*dev.*", device!~".*docker.*", mountpoint!="/etc/resolv.conf",}) - sum(node_filesystem_free_bytes{job='node-exporter', instance_name="$node", device=~".*dev.*", device!~".*docker.*", mountpoint!="/etc/resolv.conf",})) / sum(node_filesystem_free_bytes{job='node-exporter', instance_name="$node", device=~".*dev.*", device!~".*docker.*", mountpoint!="/etc/resolv.conf",})

(sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{job='node-exporter', instance_name="$node", device=~".*dev.*", device!~".*docker.*", mountpoint!="/etc/resolv.conf"}) - sum(node_filesystem_free_bytes{job='node-exporter', instance_name="$node", device=~".*dev.*", device!~".*docker.*", mountpoint!="/etc/resolv.conf"}))/1024/1024/1024

title: Cluster概览
